short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to save any image in PNG/JPEG on Reddit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save Reddit images in their original format, bypassing the usual WEBM files. 

Have you ever wondered how to download a Reddit image file without complex manipulations? This simple tool allows you to easily get high-quality PNG and JPG images directly from Reddit. Just enable this extension and save the image via the browser context menu.

üöÄ Key Features:
‚úîÔ∏è Convert WEBM files on Reddit to JPG or PNG images.
‚úîÔ∏è Download Reddit images as usual PNG/JPEG images.
‚úîÔ∏è Find and save the image source from any post on Reddit.

‚ÑπÔ∏è Additional Information:
‚Ä¢ Please note that using this extension might slightly slow down your internet connection due to high-quality image downloads.
‚Ä¢ Reddit to PNG is developed independently, and is not officially endorsed by or affiliated with Reddit.
